item.description:
The sixth slam in Jamaica Plain at Doyle's @ 3484 Washington Street, Jamaica Plain Sunday,

February 12, 2012 Doors open @ 6:30 PM, Show starts @7:00

TICKETS: 8.00 in advance 10.00 at the door
http://www.massmouth.eventbrite.com

The theme is "CUPID"

SPECIAL GUEST: Domingo Guyton!

Doyle's is located in the Jamaica Plain neighborhood of Boston, accesible by the Orange line (Green Street Station) and close to the Sam Adams Brewery!

Doyle's is host to one of New England's largest selections of draft beer. The mahogany bar dates back over 125 years to 1882.

UPCOMING EVENTS:
February 14, 2012 7:00 doors, 7:30 show,
Blue 22, Quincy, MA
Theme: Stupid Cupid

February 20, 2012 6:30 doors, 7:00 show,
Club Passim, Cambridge, MA
Theme: Shell Shocked

March 11th , 6:30 doors, 7:00 show,
Doyle's Cafe Jamaica Plain
SEMI-FINALS!

BIG MOUTH OFF On April 11, 2012, 7-9PM

All the finalists will gather at Coolidge Corner, Main Theater to compete for a week in a medieval townhouse in Tuscany and other prizes.

"Because you have a life, you have a story. Bring it!"

Listen to our podcasts at iTunes and podcast webpage. And check out our video archive to get an idea about 5 minute stories http://massmouth.ning...

FAQ
What is a STORY SLAM? (http://massmouth.ning...)

How can I be sure to get to tell my story? (http://massmouth.ning...)

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: "cupid" story slam @ Doyle's in Jamaica Plain
